name: Connected Power Tower Defense
description:
Tower defense where you open gates to power different towers. The more towers that are powered, the weaker they all are. Some towers attack faster/hit harder and use more power.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with a theme of "Joined Together": https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021

Art assets from ArMM1998: https://opengameart.org/content/zelda-like-tilesets-and-sprites
